Name: Maximize Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Sprint Overrun
Description: Reduce days beyond planned sprint end

Name: Maximize Feature Completion
Description: Increase ratio of features completed per release

Name: Minimize Time to Market
Description: Reduce time from project start to release

Name: Maximize Team Utilization
Description: Increase proportion of team capacity used per sprint

Name: Minimize Budget Overrun
Description: Reduce budget variance at project end

Name: Minimize Backlog Ageing
Description: Reduce average age of user stories in backlog

Name: Maximize Release Frequency
Description: Increase number of releases in given time frame
